page.title: 15MORE EVENTS NR.WIDEGATES.
page.content: The Liskeard Show is an event which is staged every year during July.On display are various items of farming machinery and livestock. Cattle are judged for theirpedigree and tractors are also on show.Other items of interest include the show jumping and the amusement tent. The Morval Fete is held within the grounds of the vicarage.Its various attractions include the gym displays and country dancing performed by the local children of the school.Fun events such as apple bobbing, archery and pony rides make for a pleasant afternoon.Refreshments including cream teas are also on sale from the stalls. Trenode children join Morval Church to celebrate Christmas with a Christingle.
